snippet.title: SimCity BuildIt – Your Kind of City – Official Trailer
snippet.description:
This is your kind of city. Welcome home, Mayor! Download for free on the App Store or Google Play: http://bit.ly/SCBI_LA

With countless buildings and vivid, 3D-quality graphics, SimCity BuildIt is the most realistic city builder on mobile. Create and trade resources with friends and other cities. Unlock exclusive buildings or unleash natural (and not so natural) disasters! This all-new SimCity game – designed just for mobile – is now available.

Bring your city to life in SimCity BuildIt!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SimCityBuildIt
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SimCityBuildIt
